channel.title: How do i add multiple npc dialouge options in packet 185
channel.description:
I have been toying around with NpcDialogue and I can't figure out how to add multiple options into packet 185. Explained, I have to npc's with separate teleport options, but when you click one it teleports you to only one area, and I can't figure out how to fix it.
Thanks for the help, OwnageOwnt [br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 21, 2008, 01:39:38 PM[/size][hr]Upon futher investigation, I figured it out myself.
Please LOCK THIS. =]
